(a) the reduction of water withdrawals; and (b)
the reduction of water discharges.
AR 24. If the undertaking provides targets on withdrawals, it may include water withdrawal from
polluted soils and aquifers, and water withdrawn and treated for remediation purposes.
AR 25. If the undertaking provides targets on discharges, it may include water discharges to
groundwater such as reinjection to aquifers, or water returning to a groundwater source via
a soakaway or a swale.
